title: PIMCO Income Strategy Fund II (PFN) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: PIMCO Income Strategy Fund II ( PFN  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.08 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased PFN prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 9th quarter that PFN has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $10.5, the dividend yield is 9.14%.
The previous trading day's last sale of PFN was $10.5, representing a -2.69% decrease from the 52 week high of $10.79 and a 18.24% increase over the 52 week low of $8.88.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the PFN Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
